body_html:
@Randl, @asimshankar, I am facing similar intermittent error while building master:

ERROR: /home/j/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:117:1: no such package '@nasm//': java.io.IOException: block overrun and referenced by '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:licenses'

I tried all solutions mentioned above, but none has helped. wget from all 3 links works.
Is there a way to validate it is JDK bug?
body_text:

ERROR: /home/j/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:117:1: no such package '@nasm//': java.io.IOException: block overrun and referenced by '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:licenses'
I tried all solutions mentioned above, but none has helped. wget from all 3 links works.

body:
@Randl, @asimshankar, I am facing similar intermittent error while building master:

`ERROR: /home/j/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:117:1: no such package '@nasm//': java.io.IOException: block overrun and referenced by '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:licenses'`

I tried all solutions mentioned above, but none has helped. `wget` from all 3 links works.
Is there a way to validate it is JDK bug?
